long_description: The Respiro Moderate bike saddle features a central cutout, cooling air channel and cushioning gel to offer great comfort on recreational rides. Central cutout helps distribute weight and relieve pressure on sensitive areas; front ventilation channel moves cooling air along cutout. RoyalGel adapts to your anatomy and reduces pressure points; does not age, harden, or migrate over time. Elastomers, as well as the RoyalGel, absorb shock for further comfort. Saddle cover is designed to stay cooler in the sun, helping keep your backside from getting scorched when you remount after an off-bike stroll or errand. The Respiro Moderate saddle shape encourages an almost upright riding position for comfort. Integrated clip system (ICS) allows for hassle-free attachment of a compatible saddle bag (not included).
short_description: The Respiro Moderate bike saddle features a central cutout, cooling air channel and cushioning gel to offer great comfort on recreational rides.
